title: xMatix Sales
subtitle: Execute sales with speed and control

hero.title: xMatix Sales
hero.description1: Move deals forward. Enforce policies. Close predictably.
hero.description2: xMatix Sales helps organizations execute sales processes with consistent workflows, real-time governance, and full visibility from lead to order.

cardsData.title: The Problem
cardsData.content: Sales teams rely on fragmented tools, manual approvals, and inconsistent processes that slow deal cycles and increase risk.
list: Leads and opportunities are tracked but not governed
Pricing and discounts vary by representative

cardsData.title: The xMatix Approach
cardsData.content: xMatix Sales standardizes how sales activities are executed so every deal follows a governed and repeatable process.

keyCapabilities.title: Core Capabilities
keyCapabilities.description2: xMatix Sales modernizes sales execution without replacing existing CRM systems while improving speed, control, and predictability.

cardsData.title: Lead and Opportunity Execution
cardsData.description: Guide lead qualification, opportunity progression, and stage movement through governed workflows.

cardsData.title: Pricing and Discount Governance
cardsData.description: Enforce pricing rules, discount limits, and approval thresholds during execution.

cardsData.title: Approval and Deal Control
cardsData.description: Route approvals automatically based on deal value, risk, and policy.

cardsData.title: Order Readiness and Handoff
cardsData.description: Ensure deals move cleanly into order fulfillment and billing execution.

cardsData.title: Cross-Team Coordination
cardsData.description: Align sales execution with finance, service, and supply chain teams.

requestADemo.heading: See xMatix Sales in Action
requestADemo.description: Reduce sales cycle time, prevent revenue leakage, and gain real-time visibility into deal execution without disrupting existing systems.
